import numpy as np from numpy import zeros,fromfile,sqrt,sum,log10 from H5hutpy import *
X=np.zeros(100,float) Y=np.zeros(100,float) f = open('Xvals.npy', "r") X_in= np.fromfile(f,dtype=np.float) f = open('Yvals.npy', "r") Y_in= np.fromfile(f,dtype=np.float) for i in range(0,100): X[i]=X_in[i+10] Y[i]=Y_in[i+10]
last_locations_errora = zeros((2,100))
f = H5OpenFile("lagrangian_2nd_A.particles.Chris.h5part", H5_O_RDONLY, H5_PROP_DEFAULT) nsteps = H5GetNumSteps(f) H5SetStep(f, nsteps-1) ids = np.empty(100, dtype='int32') H5PartReadDataInt32(f, 'id', ids) pos = np.empty((2,100), dtype='float64') H5PartReadDataFloat64(f, 'x', pos[0,:]) H5PartReadDataFloat64(f, 'y', pos[1,:]) idx = np.argsort(ids) pos = pos[:,idx] last_locations_errora[0,:] = pos[0,:] - X[:] last_locations_errora[1,:] = pos[1,:] - Y[:]
lsa = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errora[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errora[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_a=sqrt(lsa)
last_locations_errorb = zeros((2,100))
f = H5OpenFile("lagrangian_2nd_B.particles.Chris.h5part", H5_O_RDONLY, H5_PROP_DEFAULT) nsteps = H5GetNumSteps(f) H5SetStep(f, nsteps-1) ids = np.empty(100, dtype='int32') H5PartReadDataInt32(f, 'id', ids) pos = np.empty((2,100), dtype='float64') H5PartReadDataFloat64(f, 'x', pos[0,:]) H5PartReadDataFloat64(f, 'y', pos[1,:]) idx = np.argsort(ids) pos = pos[:,idx] last_locations_errorb[0,:] = pos[0,:] - X[:] last_locations_errorb[1,:] = pos[1,:] - Y[:]
lsb = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errorb[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errorb[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_b=sqrt(lsb)
ab_ratio = l2_norm_a/l2_norm_b ab_convergence = log10(ab_ratio)
